title: Programming Fundamentals Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of programming concepts with code examples

questions.question:
What is the output of the following JavaScript code?
```js
console.log(2 + '2');
```
questions.explanation: In JavaScript, when you add a number and a string, the number is converted to a string and concatenation occurs.

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to change the text color of an element?
questions.explanation: The `color` property in CSS is used to set the color of text content.

questions.question: What is the correct way to declare a variable in Python?
questions.explanation: Python uses dynamic typing, so you simply assign a value to a variable name without declaring its type.

questions.question:
What does the following HTML element do?
```html
<input type="email" required>
```
options: Creates a text input that validates email format
Creates a button that sends emails
Creates a text area for email content
Creates a dropdown with email options
questions.correctAnswer: Creates a text input that validates email format
questions.explanation: The `type="email"` attribute creates an input field that automatically validates that the entered text is a properly formatted email address.
